name: Sneasel
description: Vicious in nature, it drives Pidgey from their nests and scavenges any leftovers it can find.

attacks.name: Fury Swipes
attacks.effect: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Beat Up
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each of your Pokémon in play. This attack does 20 damage times the number of heads.
